subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ovilus question and feed back needed PLEASE
author: Marlboro63@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1221579756
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Suzanne,
 
I did a review on the Ovilus 1 for _www.paranormalpython.com_ 
(http://www.paranormalpython.com) .  I  suggest you read it first so you understand how it 
works before purchasing  one.
 
Jeff
 
 
In a message dated 9/16/2008 7:35:34 A.M. Central Daylight Time,  
suzyq6819@... writes:

 
 
 
From what I've seen it looks pretty interesting.  I'm also  considering 
purchasing them both.  I haven't thoroughly  investigated the 'puck', but it looks 
like a great tool!  Anyone  else? 
 
I would love to hear about anyone's experiences with it.  I  think, if I 
remember correctly that one of the gals in the group have  one :)
 
Suzanne

--- On Tue, 9/16/08, juswitchy  <Alwaysguess@Alwaysg> wrote:


From:  juswitchy <Alwaysguess@Alwaysg>
Subject: [EVP-ITC]  Ovilus question and feed back needed PLEASE
To:  EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsTo: 
Date: Tuesday, September 16, 2008,  3:33 AM


 
Was jus wondering what you all thought of the Ovilus and the  puck? I 
was really thinking of buying one and was jus looking for  feed back or 
a tip on something better..

Blessed  Be

Jus~Witchy







 




**************Psssst...Have you heard the news? There's a new fashion blog, 
plus the latest fall trends and hair styles at StyleList.com.
